creditline: Gift of the Charles Bolles Rogers Family: Frederick Van Dusen Rogers, Nancy Rogers Pierson, Mary Rogers Savage
description: cruet set (a), with eight crystal bottles (b-i), and two silver ladles (j,k)
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside of stand (indistinct).  Lion passant and maker\'s mark on side of base and on bottle separator on shaft.  Lion passant, maker\'s mark, and duty mark on silver fittings of all the bottles.  Maker\'s mark and lion passant on hinged lid of one cruet bottle.  The two caster covers and one foot on the bast struck with French control mark.
title: Cruet set
